CONTENT: 会社設立?　ガンダムの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's founded a company? For Gundams?

CONTENT: ミオリネさんが考えたんだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It was Ms. Miorine's own idea!

CONTENT: その場で出資募って⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She solicited investment and

CONTENT: ペイル社とシン・セー社の 開発部門の一部を買収
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y compró los equipos de Pale y Shin Sei.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: bought out some of Peil's and Shin Sei's development teams on the spot.

CONTENT: ゾっとしたよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I almost fainted.

CONTENT: ご令嬢はやること派手だわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las niñas adineradas juegan a otro nivel.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Rich girls do everything flashier.

CONTENT: 裏でもあるんじゃね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ha de tener un motivo oculto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She must have an ulterior motive.

CONTENT: 4 ダウト
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Four. Doubt.

CONTENT: バレてる!? ニヒヒ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How did you know?!

CONTENT: スレッタ先輩⸺　編入してから ずーっとトラブル続きですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Suletta no tuvo más que problemas desde que vino.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Suletta's been having trouble ever since she transferred here.

CONTENT: 近い未来 異性を巡ってトラブルあり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y preveo problemas con el sexo opuesto próximamente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You will have trouble with men in the near future.

CONTENT: えー 困っちゃいますー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?! That's the last thing I need!

CONTENT: まあ 好きにすりゃいいんじゃねえの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shouldn't we just let her do as she likes?

CONTENT: あーしには関係ねえし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's got nothing to do with me.

CONTENT: 関係あるわよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's got plenty to do with you.

CONTENT: ミオリネさん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine?

CONTENT: あんで お姫さままでいんだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What'd you bring the Princess here for?

CONTENT: ここ 会社にするから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm setting up the company here.

CONTENT: え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: 株式会社GUND-ARMは 私と皆さんで経営します
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nosotros armaremos la S. p. A GUND-ARM.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: GUND-ARM, Inc. will be run by me and everyone here.

CONTENT: 以上 よろしく
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's it. You're welcome.

CONTENT: は? はあー!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Say what?!

CONTENT: 会社を興した以上 やることは山積みよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En una empresa hay que hacer muchas cosas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now the company's launched, there's a ton of things to do.

CONTENT: ちょ... な... なに話進めてんだよ てか なんで俺たち...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No vayas tan rápido. ¿Por qué nosotros te...?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: D-Don't talk like we've agreed to this! And why us, any-

CONTENT: 給料は ちゃんと出す
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You'll be properly paid.

CONTENT: ほかに何か質問は? ないよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Any other questions? None, right?

CONTENT: ごめんなさい ごめんなさい　うちのミオリネさんが ごめんなさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo siento mucho. Me disculpo en su nombre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry. I apologize for whatever Ms. Miorine's doing.

CONTENT: そもそも ガンダムで 何をする会社なんだい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cuál es el propósito de la empresa GUND-ARM?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What will your company be doing with Gundams, anyway?

CONTENT: それは...　これから考える
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's... what I'm about to figure out.

CONTENT: あんのクソスペーシアンがー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That Spacian turd!

CONTENT: チュチュ 授業中
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Chuchu, class is in session.

CONTENT: ニカ姉は いいんかよ!　あいつの言いなりで!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿A ti no te molesta estar a su servicio?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you okay with this, Nika?! Why do we need to obey her?!

CONTENT: んん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: まあ エアリアルにも触れるし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, if it means I get to work on Aerial...

CONTENT: それに会社がうまくいけば⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And if the company is successful,

CONTENT: アーシアンでも活躍できるって 証明になるでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: demostraremos que los Earthians somos capaces de todo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: it's a chance to prove that Earthians can do as well as Spacians.

CONTENT: でも クソスペワガママ女の 手下とか やだー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Yo no quiero trabajar a las órdenes de una Spacian caprichosa!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, I'm not gonna wait on some selfish Spacian bimbo!

CONTENT: 壊れんぞー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's breaking!

CONTENT: ヌーノ お前はいいんかよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you okay with this, Nuno?!

CONTENT: それは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well...

CONTENT: 給料次第だよなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It depends on the salary.

CONTENT: ガッポリなら文句ねえ　ガッカリならサボる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si es bueno, no tengo quejas. Si no, no trabajaré.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If it's mighty, I won't complain. If it's meager, I'll slack off.

CONTENT: いやいやいやいやいや
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, no, no, no!

CONTENT: ガンダムだよ? 魔女だよ? 呪われちゃってるんだよ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hablamos de Gundams. Y brujas. ¡Están malditos!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're talking Gundams! And witches! They're all cursed!

CONTENT: お前 経営に興味あるんだろ? ちょうどよくね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No te interesa la gestión? Va mucho contigo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You want to learn about business, right? Isn't this perfect?

CONTENT: よくないよ!　グループの偉い人たちにも...　マルタン・アップモント! はい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡No! Para los peces gordos será un estigma. -Martin Upmont. -¡Sí!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's a perfect disaster! The group's big shots are- Martin Upmont! Yes, sir!

CONTENT: 騒ぐなら出ていけ!　すみません!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you can't be quiet, leave! I'm very sorry!

CONTENT: やるわけないだろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Count me out.

CONTENT: 君は どう思う?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And what do you think?

CONTENT: やること次第かな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Depends on what we'd be doing.

CONTENT: アリヤ先輩 ティル先輩
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Aliya! Mr. Till!

CONTENT: ミオリネ先輩⸺　どこにいるか 知ってます?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you have any clue where Ms. Miorine is?

CONTENT: エアリアルのことを知りたい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You want to know more about Aerial?

CONTENT: 会社としてガンダムを扱う以上 色々 お伺いしたくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si trataremos con Gundams, tengo varias preguntas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Our company will be handling Gundams, so I have a lot of questions.

CONTENT: エアリアルは本当に安全なのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is Ariel really safe?

CONTENT: 量産は可能なのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Can she be mass-produced?

CONTENT: そもそも なぜ ガンダムであることを⸺　隠して開発したのかとか...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y por qué lo desarrollaron ocultando que era un Gundam?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And why develop her when you had to hide that she was a Gundam?

CONTENT: エアリアルの 過去のデータをすべて送ったわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te envié todos los datos del Aerial que hay.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just sent you all of Ariel's past data.

CONTENT: ガンダムが欲しい人間は 私や あなたの言葉より⸺　数値を信じると思うから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los que quieran un Gundam confiarán más en eso que en nuestras palabras.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: People who want Gundams will trust numbers over your words or mine.

CONTENT: どうも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you.

CONTENT: それに量産は現時点では不可能よ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y actualmente no es posible producirlo en masa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anyway, mass production is impossible at this point.

CONTENT: GUNDフォーマットは⸺　データ蓄積どころか 基礎部分すら分かっていない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No conocemos ni cómo acumula datos el GUND Format ni cuáles son sus bases.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We haven't pinned down the basic elements of the GUND Format, and aren't ready to accumulate data.

CONTENT: まずは解析から始めないとダメ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You'll have to begin with analysis.

CONTENT: お前が考えてる以上に⸺　ガンダムの呪いは重い
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La maldición de los Gundams es más grave de lo que piensas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The Gundam's curse is a heavier burden than you think.

CONTENT: こういうことか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So that's what he meant.

CONTENT: あの お母さん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um, Mom?

CONTENT: 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What is it?

CONTENT: あのね あの...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, um...

CONTENT: どうして...　お母さんは 私に エアリアルのこと⸺　ガンダムじゃないって 言ったのかなって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿por qué me dijiste que el Aerial no era un Gundam?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why did you... say to me... that Aerial wasn't a Gundam?

CONTENT: エアリアルは家族だよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Aerial is family to us, right?

CONTENT: 呪いなんて本当はないんだよね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's not really cursed, is she?

CONTENT: 怖い?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Does it frighten you?

CONTENT: ううん いつものお母さんの手だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No. Es tu brazo de siempre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No. It's your arm, Mom. Same as always.

CONTENT: ありがとう　でもね 人は よく知らないものを 恐怖に感じるの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Gracias. Pero la gente teme lo que no conoce.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you. But even so, people can't help being afraid of the unknown.

CONTENT: 人は恐怖を遠ざけようとする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: E intenta mantener alejado ese temor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And they try to keep that fear at a distance.

CONTENT: 攻撃しようとする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Or even attack it.

CONTENT: ガンダムが禁じられた機体という 人々の意識は消えない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La gente seguirá considerando a los Gundams como algo prohibido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gundams will remain in people's minds as forbidden machines.

CONTENT: でも 私は あなたたちを守りたかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even so, I wanted to protect you two

CONTENT: 忌まわしい呪いの火の粉から
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: de las chispas de esa maldición.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: from the curse's abominable flame.

CONTENT: は... お母さん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mom...

CONTENT: そうだよね 私たちのためだよね!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So that's it. It was all for us, right?

CONTENT: もちろんよ 愛しの娘たちだもの!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But of course! You're my beloved daughters.

CONTENT: 変なこと聞いて ごめんなさい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sorry for my silly question!

CONTENT: これからは私も エアリアルのこと守るから!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: From now on, I'll protect Aerial too.

CONTENT: お母さんのために!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: For your sake, Mom!

CONTENT: みんなに教えてあげて　ガンダムは みんなのそばにいて いいものだって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Muéstrenle al mundo que los Gundams pueden estar con nosotros.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Be sure to tell everyone. It's safe to have Gundams by their side.

CONTENT: うん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right!

CONTENT: あんたさ⸺　あの母親に もっと 聞くことあったんじゃないの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No tenías más preguntas para tu madre?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anyway... Wasn't there something more important to ask your mother?

CONTENT: え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: どうしてエアリアルに乗っても あんたは平気なのかとか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como por qué puedes montar en el Aerial.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like why you're able to pilot Aerial without suffering any harm.

CONTENT: ガンダムだって分かったんだし 怖くないの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ahora sabes que es un Gundam. ¿No te asusta?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now you know she's a Gundam... aren't you scared?

CONTENT: 全然 エアリアルは ずっと一緒の家族ですから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No, el Aerial es mi familia. Siempre estuvo ahí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not at all! Aerial and I have always been family!

CONTENT: あんたがそれでいいなら いいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Have it your way...

CONTENT: やあ 水星ちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, Mercurian Miss.

CONTENT: お母さまの誤解は解けた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you make up with your mother?

CONTENT: はい それなら ちゃんと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes! In fact, I-

CONTENT: スレッタ そいつとは何も話すな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta. Don't tell that creep a thing.

CONTENT: また... ですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're mad again?

CONTENT: 花婿が俺と親しくなるのは嫌か?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No quieres que tu prometida me hable?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You don't want me getting close to your groom?

CONTENT: 会社のために エアリアルのこと 調べたいだけでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo quieres información sobre el Aerial para tu empresa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You only want to know more about Aerial for your company's sake.

CONTENT: そっちの会社は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And what about your company?

CONTENT: のんびり構えてる余裕ないだろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You have absolutely no time to sit back.

CONTENT: あの場では なんとか乗りきれたけど　投資した連中も慈善活動家じゃない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Superaste la primera crisis, pero los inversores no son filántropos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You managed to make it through there, but your investors aren't philanthropists.

CONTENT: 事業計画次第じゃ 最悪 全部白紙だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Podrían dejarte sin nada dependiendo de tu plan.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Depending on your business plan, you might go back to zero.

CONTENT: 何が言いたいわけ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What are you trying to say?

CONTENT: その会社 俺が引き取ろうか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Quieres que me encargue de la empresa?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why not let me take over the company?

CONTENT: え? 条件は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? On what terms?

CONTENT: え? 君との結婚
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Marriage to you.

CONTENT: ひええっ けけけ...　うるさい け... 結婚
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?! M-M... Oh, shut up.

CONTENT: う... 結婚ー!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: M-M-Marriage?!

CONTENT: 近いうちに また話そう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This ship will now... Let's discuss this again soon.

CONTENT: じゃあね 水星ちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...enter a docking course. Bye now, Mercurian Miss.

CONTENT: ほほう...　あ... 私 分かっちゃいました　シャディクさん　ミオリネさんのことが...　す... すすすー 好...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya lo entiendo. Miorine, Shaddiq está ena... ena...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Uh... I... Please be seated and fasten your... I-I think I get it. It's you, Ms. Miorine! We will now enter... ...a docking course. Shaddiq is... Please fasten your seatbelts. in l-l-l-love with...

CONTENT: そんなわけないでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't kid yourself.

CONTENT: えー?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: あいつ グラスレーの施設で育った 孤児なの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es un huérfano criado en una institución de Grassley.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's just that he... was raised in an orphanage run by the Grassley family.
What?

CONTENT: やれることは なんでもやるやつよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That guy will do whatever it takes.

CONTENT: あんたも気をつけなさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't let your guard down.

CONTENT: はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right...

CONTENT: ミオリネ社長の指示どおり⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As President Miorine instructed,

CONTENT: 投資家向けの 開示情報をまとめました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: organicé la información para los inversores.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've organized the disclosure information for the investors.

CONTENT: もう受け入れてるー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You've accepted your fate already?

CONTENT: 細かい登記は置いておいて⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Putting aside minor registrations,

CONTENT: 決めなきゃいけないことが たくさんあるんです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: there are a lot of things we have to decide.

CONTENT: 給料とか ギャラとか ボーナスとか昇給とかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El salario, las cuotas, las pagas extras, los bonus de ascenso...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like salary, wages, bonuses, and raises.

CONTENT: 全部 お金の話だね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Todo se relaciona con el dinero.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're all money matters, huh?

CONTENT: それも大事ですけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Those things are important too, but...

CONTENT: まずは 定款でしょうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero lo primero es el estatuto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We have to start with articles of incorporation.

CONTENT: ていかん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Articles?

CONTENT: この会社が どういうものかって ことを書いた規約だね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La ordenanza que dicta qué es la empresa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're documents that establish the nature of the company.

CONTENT: 会社名 設立者の氏名　発行可能株式総数とか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Su nombre, el del fundador, el número de acciones disponibles...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The company's name, its founders, the total number of authorized shares...

CONTENT: 具体的なことは事業計画書に 書くことになるんですけど...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Debemos escribir un proyecto de empresa detallado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The specifics will be written in the company's business plan, but...

CONTENT: この会社が何すんのかって話だろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En resumen, hay que saber qué vamos a hacer.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We have to decide the company's mission, right?

CONTENT: やるなら儲かるのがいいよな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whatever it is, it should be something profitable.

CONTENT: スレッタのお母さんの話だと⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: From what Suletta's mom said,

CONTENT: GUNDフォーマットの安全性を 立証しないと⸺　ガンダムは作れないんだよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: no podemos construir Gundams sin demostrar antes que el GUND Format es seguro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: unless the GUND Format's safety is proven, we won't be able to manufacture Gundams.

CONTENT: ペイル社のガンダムは? 名前...　ファラクト
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about Peil's Gundam? I think they called it... Pharact.

CONTENT: あっちはエアリアルとは 違う技術なの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did it use technology different from Aerial's?

CONTENT: 知らべてみないことには なんともね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We can't say without looking into it.

CONTENT: ペイル社から預かった 資料によると⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Según los documentos que nos cedió Pale,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: According to the documents we received from Peil,

CONTENT: ファラクト1機製造するのに かかった費用は⸺　こちらです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: esto es lo que les costó crear un Pharact.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: the cost of building one Pharact unit was... This much.

CONTENT: マジか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you serious?

CONTENT: あーしのモビルスーツ 何機買えんだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cuántos Mobile Suits podría comprarme con esto?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How many units of my mobile suit could you buy with that?

CONTENT: シン・セー社とペイル社の 開発部門を買い取ったあとの⸺　この会社の資産は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué presupuesto nos queda después de comprar los equipos de desarrollo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: After buying out Shin Sei's and Peil's development teams, what are the company's assets?

CONTENT: こちらです　マジか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This much. Are you serious?

CONTENT: ティコたちのエサ代にもならないぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No es suficiente ni para la comida de Tico.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's not even enough to feed Giko and the others.

CONTENT: どのみち製造とか夢のまた夢だな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Construir un Gundam es un sueño.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Manufacturing is far beyond our dreams at this point.

CONTENT: そんなもの 派手な事業計画を打ち出して⸺　期待を高めれば 融資してくれるところはあるわよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si exponemos un plan que cree expectativas, algunos lo financiarán.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's just make a rosy business plan to raise everyone's expectations. Then people will come to finance us.

CONTENT: じゃあ 何言うんだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What are we gonna sell, then?

CONTENT: そうねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right...

CONTENT: 普通に考えたら 兵器として売るのが妥当かな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo más apropiado sería venderlos como armas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Normally, selling them as weapons would seem the most reasonable plan.

CONTENT: まあ それが自然だよな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, that would be the natural thing to do.

CONTENT: ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: なんだよ 儲かるだろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? It would make money, wouldn't it?

CONTENT: 君は戦争孤児じゃないのか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're a war orphan, aren't you?

CONTENT: そんなやつ地球じゃごまんといるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La Tierra está llena de ellos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There are tons of kids like me on Earth.

CONTENT: アーシアン限定で売るなら賛成
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si solo se los vendemos a Earthians, bien.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If we're only selling to Earthians, I'm for it.

CONTENT: でも それって...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But that would mean...

CONTENT: 地球が また戦場になる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Habrá otra guerra en la Tierra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Earth would become a battlefield again.

CONTENT: それは嫌だな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't want that.

CONTENT: 待ってよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hold on a second.

CONTENT: そもそも アーシアンにだけ売るなんて⸺　現実的じゃないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vendérselos solo a Earthians no es realista.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In the first place, selling only to Earthians isn't even realistic.

CONTENT: 僕ら 一応 ベネリットグループなんだし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're a part of the Benerit Group, after all.

CONTENT: はあ? スペーシアンの味方するわけ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Te pondrás del lado de los Spacians?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?! Are you siding with the Spacians?

CONTENT: そうじゃないけど...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's not what I mean.

CONTENT: 俺は モビルスーツ作るために 来たわけじゃねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo vine a hacer Mobile Suits.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I didn't come here to build mobile suits.

CONTENT: 金は好きだけどよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I love money, for sure.

CONTENT: 人殺しの道具で稼ぐ気なんて 起きねえよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero no quiero hacerme rico con armas que matan.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even so, I don't feel like profiting off killing machines.

CONTENT: ああ なんだかんだ お坊ちゃんだわ お前
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Parece que solo eres un niño malcriado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: At the end of the day, you're just another spoiled kid.

CONTENT: ああ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, yeah?!

CONTENT: み... 皆さん!　ケンカ ダメです!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: E-Everyone! We can't fight like this!

CONTENT: そうだよ 落ち着いて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's right. Calm down.

CONTENT: ニカ姉は? え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about you, Nika? Huh?

CONTENT: 自分の作ったモビルスーツで スペーシアンが好き勝手すんの⸺　見てられんの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Podrías soportar que los Spacians hagan lo que quieran con tus Mobile Suits?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If Spacians do as they please with the mobile suits we build, could you handle it?

CONTENT: 私は...
決めるのは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The one who decides...

CONTENT: 決めるのは社長だと思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: should be the president.

CONTENT: え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: ミオリネさん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine...

CONTENT: 別に兵器でいいでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Who cares if we sell weapons?

CONTENT: 文句あるなら 出てってもらうだけだし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you don't like it, you're free to go.

CONTENT: ダ... ダメです みんな一緒じゃないと!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: N-No way! We're all in this together!

CONTENT: はあ? 私の会社なんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? It's my company, you know.

CONTENT: そうなった場合 出てくのお前だかんな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si llegamos a eso, te irás tú.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If that's how it is, you're the one who should leave.

CONTENT: 何よ それ あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What are you...?

CONTENT: ハア 分かった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Fine.

CONTENT: ミオリネさん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine!

CONTENT: マルタン は... はい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Martin! Y-Yes?

CONTENT: 登記書類の 細かい部分は あんたに任せる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te encargas de los detalles de los documentos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll leave the details of the registration papers to you.

CONTENT: リリッケは法人口座開設の手続き　それとマルタンのフォロー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lilique, abre una cuenta bancaria para la empresa y ayuda a Martin.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Lilique, you'll open the company's bank account. And help Martin with the rest.

CONTENT: はい! わ... 分かった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right.

CONTENT: この中で絵心のある人間は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is anyone here a decent artist?

CONTENT: 会社のロゴ作って イカしたやつ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Crea el logo de la empresa. Uno bueno.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Design us a company logo. Make it stylish.

CONTENT: スレッタ ほか　まとめんな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta... and the rest... Don't lump us together!

CONTENT: ガンダムの悪いイメージを⸺　払拭できるようなPV作って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creen un vídeo para limpiar la imagen de los Gundams.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Make a PR video that will rid Gundams of their bad image.

CONTENT: 期日は2週間
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You've got two weeks.

CONTENT: 2週間!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Two weeks?!

CONTENT: クソ親父の気が変わる前に 全部固めるの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Antes de que mi maldito padre cambie de opinión.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nail down everything before my lousy father changes his mind.

CONTENT: サボらずやりなさいよね!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't slack off!

CONTENT: あんの クソスペワガママ女ー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That bossy little Spacian turd!

CONTENT: 悪い ゴミ捨て場かと思ったわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Perdona, pensaba que eras una papelera.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, sorry. I thought this was a garbage dump.

CONTENT: んだよ つまんねえの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Come on. You're not making this fun.

CONTENT: 掃除か?　あ... 感心だな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Picking up litter? How noble.

CONTENT: 続きは やっといてやるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll pick up where you left off.

CONTENT: あ... ああ... 悪いな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure... Sorry for the trouble.

CONTENT: うちの寮に来いよ ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Come to our House.

CONTENT: シャワーもある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can shower there.

CONTENT: 俺との決闘をさけてたヘタレに 媚びるつもりはない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No le pediré ayuda a un cobarde que me negaba un duelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I won't lick the boots of a wimp who was afraid to duel me.

CONTENT: さけてたのは お前になら 任せられると思ったからだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo esquivaba porque pensaba que podías encargarte tú.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I only avoided it because I thought I could leave it to you.

CONTENT: ああ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: 気が変わったら連絡してくれ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Call me if you change your mind.

CONTENT: 俺は お前のこと 結構 気に入ってるんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I happen to be... quite fond of you.

CONTENT: 憐れまれてたまるかよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't need anyone's pity!

CONTENT: はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes?

CONTENT: ベギルペンデとミカエリスを送った
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te envié Beguir-Pente y un Michaelis.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I sent you some Beguir-Pentes and a Michaelis.

CONTENT: 対ガンダム兵器も用意してある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're bringing anti-Gundam weapons too.

CONTENT: 決闘で奪うつもりはないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No se lo robaré en un duelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've no intention of seizing it in a duel.

CONTENT: やりかたは お前に任せる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do it whatever way you like.

CONTENT: だが忘れるな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But don't forget.

CONTENT: ガンダムは この世から 消し去らねばならんということを
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Debemos eliminar a los Gundams del mundo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The Gundams must be erased from this world.

CONTENT: はい 義父さん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, Father.

CONTENT: 狭すぎる　視野も　思想も
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Su perspectiva y sus sueños son demasiado reducidos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He's far too narrow. In his vision... and his ideas.

CONTENT: 我らカテドラルは⸺　すべてのガンダムを⸺　否定します
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cathedral rechaza a todos los Gundams.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And our Cathedra shall deny all Gundams.

CONTENT: ガンダム
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gundam...

CONTENT: パイロットを殺すモビルスーツ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mobile Suits que matan a sus pilotos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A mobile suit that kills its pilot.

CONTENT: GUNDフォーマット...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The GUND Format...

CONTENT: もっと知らなきゃ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have to know more.

CONTENT: そちらの 受け入れ体制が整い次第⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En cuanto estén preparados para recibirlos,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As soon as your company is ready,

CONTENT: ペイルの開発チームと ファラクトは⸺　正式に譲渡されることに なっているわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: se les cederá el Pharact y el equipo de desarrollo de Pale.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Peil's development team and the Pharact will be officially transferred to you.

CONTENT: よろしくお願いします　ベルメリア・ウィンストンさん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I look forward to working with you, Ms. Belmeria Winston.

CONTENT: それで 今日のご用は何かしら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now, then... What brings you here today?

CONTENT: ガンダムについて知りたくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I want to learn more about Gundams.

CONTENT: 搭乗者の体と精神を蝕む モビルスーツ ガンダムと⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Son Mobile Suits que corroen el cuerpo y el alma del piloto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mobile suits called Gundams that cripple their pilots' minds and bodies...

CONTENT: それを作ったヴァナディース機関
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: the Vanadis Institute that created them...

CONTENT: 魔女と呼ばれる人たちは 忌むべき存在だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A las brujas es mejor evitarlas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and the people we call witches are all to be abhorred.

CONTENT: これが世間の認識です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's what the public believes.

CONTENT: 欠陥があれば改良すればいい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If they were defective, they could have been improved.

CONTENT: なのに それすら認めず⸺　協約がどうとか理由をつけて 排除しようとするのは なぜなのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué intentan eliminarlos sea como sea por una convención?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So why did they reject that... and try to eliminate them by concocting that agreement?

CONTENT: そもそも 魔女たちは なんのためにガンダムを作ったのか　やめて　魔女なんて言いかたは やめて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y para qué crearon las brujas los Gundams? Para. No las llames brujas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And why did the witches create the Gundams in the first place? Don't. Don't call them "witches."

CONTENT: あなたも魔女の一人なんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Does that mean you're a witch too?

CONTENT: 私は ただ...　GUNDの理想に魅入られて⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo solo me dejé impresionar por el ideal del GUND
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I was merely... enthralled by the GUND's ideals...

CONTENT: あの人たちの真似事を しているだけよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y me limité a imitar lo que hacían.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and have simply been imitating what they did.

CONTENT: GUNDの理想?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The GUND's ideals...?

CONTENT: その話 詳しく聞けますか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Can you tell me more about that?

CONTENT: 相変わらず 君の居場所は ここなんだな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So you can't help hanging around this place after all.

CONTENT: あんた知ってた? GUND技術の理想ってやつ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Sabías algo del ideal de la tecnología GUND?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you know about the ideals behind GUND technology?

CONTENT: 義父さんから 大体は
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My father told me most of it.

CONTENT: 信頼されてるんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He trusts you, then.

CONTENT: されるように頑張ったんだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I worked hard to earn it.

CONTENT: で 次は誰のご機嫌取り?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And? Who are you groveling to today?

CONTENT: 君の機嫌を取りにきた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I came to grovel to you.

CONTENT: ガンダムを欲しがってる顧客がいる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There are customers who want Gundams.

CONTENT: ジェタークとペイルの モビルスーツをも凌駕する⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si pueden crear un Gundam como el Aerial,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you can develop a machine equal in strength to the Aerial

CONTENT: エアリアルと同等の機体が 開発できるのなら⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: capaz de vencer a las máquinas de Jeturk y Pale,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: that outperformed Jeturk's and Peil's mobile suits,

CONTENT: カテドラルの認可がなくても 手に入れたい客は多い
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: mucha gente lo querrá, diga lo que diga Cathedral.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: many buyers would want to obtain it even without Cathedra's approval.

CONTENT: こっちの財布事情も 把握して言ってるんでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Lo dices sabiendo la situación de mi cartera?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And I'm sure you're aware of our monetary situation.

CONTENT: 俺と手を組まないか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why don't we work together?

CONTENT: 会社の体制が整うまでの 資金援助はもちろん⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te daré apoyo financiero mientras se establece tu empresa
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not only can I give you financial support until you're on your feet,

CONTENT: 必要な人材があれば派遣する
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y te prestaré personal si hace falta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can lend you any personnel you need.

CONTENT: 悪い話じゃないだろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Doesn't sound too bad, right?

CONTENT: そっちのうまみは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And what's in it for you?

CONTENT: ガンダムは 硬直した軍需産業を盛り返す⸺　ゲームチェンジャーだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los Gundams cambiarán el juego en una industria militar estancada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gundams are a game changer that will revitalize the stagnant weapons industry.

CONTENT: これを逃して グループの発展はあり得ない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El grupo no crecerá si los ignoramos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The group will never grow further if it misses this chance.

CONTENT: あなたのパパは ガンダムアレルギーじゃない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tu papá es alérgico a los Gundams.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Isn't your Daddy allergic to Gundams?

CONTENT: どうとでもしてみせるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll bring him around.

CONTENT: それが親孝行になるはずさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: De seguro al final lo beneficiará.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I regard it as my filial duty.

CONTENT: 昔さ...　事業コンペに 2人で企画出したことあったろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Una vez presentamos un proyecto para una competición juntos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Back in the day, we submitted a project plan together in a business competition.

CONTENT: みんなに内緒で
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A secret from everyone...

CONTENT: 覚えてない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't remember a thing.

CONTENT: 企画は通ったけどさ⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The plan was accepted,

CONTENT: 義父さんたちにバレて叱られたよな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but our fathers found out and scolded us.

CONTENT: けど 俺は あの日のこと忘れてない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero yo no olvidé aquel día.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Still, I haven't forgotten that day.

CONTENT: 俺は君となら⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you and I work together,

CONTENT: 義父さんたちよりも いい未来を描けると思ってるよ　ミオリネ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: podríamos crear un futuro mejor que nuestros padres, Miorine.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I believe we can bring about a better future than our fathers. Miorine.

CONTENT: そこ 編集点 丸分かりじゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There. You can clearly see where it's been edited.

CONTENT: 先輩 ここ間違ってます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Martin, there are mistakes here.

CONTENT: ほんぎー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Aw, man...

CONTENT: 2人共 いい加減 仲直りしなよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hagan las paces de una vez.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Come on, you two! Hurry up and bury the hatchet!

CONTENT: 姫さんは? もう2週間たつぜ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y la princesa? Ya pasaron dos semanas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And where's the Princess, huh? The two weeks are up.

CONTENT: めんどくさくなって 地球に飛んだんじゃないの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: De seguro se hartó y estará en la Tierra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll bet she got fed up and ran away to Earth.

CONTENT: ミ... ミオリネさんは そんな人じゃ...　あ... ありません!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Miorine no es ese tipo de persona.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: M-Ms. Miorine wouldn't... She wouldn't do that!

CONTENT: 言いきれるほど 付き合い長くねえだろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No la conoces suficiente para afirmarlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You haven't known her long enough to say for sure.

CONTENT: 私がどうかした?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Looking for me?

CONTENT: ミオリネさん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine!

CONTENT: わ... 私はミオリネさんのこと 信じてま...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I believed in you... Ms. Miorine-

CONTENT: うっとうしい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're annoying.

CONTENT: で?　決めたんかよ ガンダムの売りかた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And? Have you decided? How we're going to sell the Gundams.

CONTENT: 収益を上げる方法は2つ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hay dos formas de generar ingresos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There are two ways to earn revenue.

CONTENT: 一つは兵器としてガンダムを売る
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Una es vender Gundams como armas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The first is to sell Gundams as weapons.

CONTENT: その場合 誰に売るかは問わない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En ese caso, venderíamos a todo el mundo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In that case, we'll ask no questions about who we sell to.

CONTENT: そして もう一つ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And the other option...

CONTENT: スペーシアンの皆さん こんにちは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Good afternoon, Spacians.

CONTENT: 私たちはパーメット研究機関 ヴァナディースです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Somos Vanadis, la organización de estudio de Permet.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We are the staff of Vanadis, an institute for Permet research.

CONTENT: なんだよ この映像
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Almost a century has passed What the hell is this video?

CONTENT: この人... 誰ですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: since we expanded our biosphere into space. Who is she?

CONTENT: ガンダム作った人
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And we humans... The one who created the Gundams.

CONTENT: ...宇宙環境との戦いを 強いられてきました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...have always struggled to survive the harsh space environment.

CONTENT: 無重力 真空 大気組成　宇宙放射線
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Gravedad cero, vacío, creación de atmósferas, radiación cósmica...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Weightlessness, vacuum, atmospheric composition, space radiation...

CONTENT: ワクチンやインプラントアプリは 高額で⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las vacunas e implantes son caros
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even with expensive vaccines and implant apps,

CONTENT: 障害そのものを 抑制することは難しい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y es difícil contener dichos obstáculos con ellas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: we can barely suppress the disorders themselves.

CONTENT: だからこそ 私たちの提唱するGUND医療は⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Which is why the GUND medical technology

CONTENT: 身体の脆弱性を補う 希望の技術となり得るのです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: son nuestra esperanza contra la vulnerabilidad del cuerpo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: that we're proposing could be a technology of hope for supplementing the fragility of the human body.

CONTENT: GUND医療?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: GUND medical technology?

CONTENT: GUNDには⸺　生命圏の拡大だけでなく⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: GUND no solo puede expandir nuestro rango habitable,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: GUND technology has the potential not only to expand the biosphere,

CONTENT: 地球と宇宙　双方の分断と格差を 融和する可能性をも秘めています
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: también sería capaz de aliviar la división entre Tierra y espacio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but also to reconcile the divisions and disparities between the people of Earth and space.

CONTENT: どうか 私たちの願いに　人類の未来に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Espero que le tiendan la mano a nuestro deseo
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We hope you will join us in grasping hold of this ray of light

CONTENT: 共に手を携える光があらんことを
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y juntos arrojemos luz sobre el futuro de la humanidad.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: that could lead to a better future for all humanity.

CONTENT: これが もう一つの道
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is the other way.

CONTENT: ガンダムに込められた本当の理念
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El auténtico ideal de los Gundams.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Pursuing the true ideals behind the Gundam...

CONTENT: GUNDを使った医療技術を 完成させて世に出すこと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hacer pública la tecnología médica de GUND perfeccionada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: we'll complete the GUND medical technology and send it out into the world.

CONTENT: それって...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But that means...

CONTENT: 命を救うために ガンダムを使うってこと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Usaríamos a los Gundams para salvar vidas?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Using Gundams to save lives?

CONTENT: モビルスーツが...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A mobile suit...

CONTENT: 命を...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: that saves lives...

CONTENT: 世間に 受け入れてもらえるかは分からない　けど やる価値はある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No sé si la sociedad lo aceptará, pero merece la pena intentarlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't know if the world will accept it or not. However... it's worth a try.

CONTENT: 何よりクソ親父とは 違う道っていうのは素敵
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y lo mejor es que seguiré un camino distinto a mi padre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: First of all, it's great to take a different path from my lousy father.

CONTENT: 責任は私が取る　文句ある?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll take on all responsibility. Any objections?

CONTENT: ガンダム ガンダム　希望の光
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: GUND-ARM, GUND-ARM. La luz de la esperanza.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: GUND-ARM... GUND-ARM... A ray of hope

CONTENT: ガンダム ガンダム　未来を目指す
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: GUND-ARM, GUND-ARM. Miramos hacia el futuro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: GUND-ARM... GUND-ARM... Forward to the future

CONTENT: 乗って安心　動いて安全
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Fiable al montar. Seguro al moverse.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's safe... to pilot! It's reliable... to use!

CONTENT: 飛べる 踊れる エアリアルー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It can fly! It can dance! Aerial!

CONTENT: 株式会社GUND-ARMは⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: GUND-ARM, Inc.

CONTENT: GUND技術による 医療事業を目指します
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: por una industria médica mediante GUND.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: is dedicated to the medical use of GUND technology.

CONTENT: 投資家への事業計画書作成と⸺　PV映像配信
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tenemos los documentos para inversores, el video promocional
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We've finished drafting the business plan for investors and streaming the PR video.

CONTENT: 定款及び各申請書類
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y el estatuto y las solicitudes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The articles of incorporation and various applications are done.

CONTENT: あとは学園が学生起業申請を 受理すれば⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo resta que la escuela acepte la creación de la empresa
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Once the school accepts our application for a student startup,

CONTENT: 会社設立は完了です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: the company will be officially established.

CONTENT: 皆さん お疲れさまでしたー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you all for your hard work!

CONTENT: マジ 疲れたわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm really tired.

CONTENT: 俺ら PV手伝っただけだけどな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y solo ayudamos con el vídeo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: All we did was help with the video, though.

CONTENT: GUND技術を扱う医療の会社か
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Una empresa médica que usa tecnología GUND...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A medical company that handles GUND technology.

CONTENT: 戦争に加担するよりは いいですよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es mejor que contribuir a la guerra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's better than being complicit in war.

CONTENT: 命を救う行為に善も悪もない　そうだろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Salvar vidas no es ni bueno ni malo. ¿Verdad?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's no good or evil when it comes to saving lives. Right?

CONTENT: まあな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess.

CONTENT: ありがとね チュチュ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you, Chuchu.

CONTENT: あーしの地元... ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In my hometown...

CONTENT: 採掘中の仕事で⸺　腕とか足とか 失くしたやついんだよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: muchos perdieron piernas o brazos en la mina.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: there are lots of people who lost their arms and legs in mining accidents.

CONTENT: 稼げて ついでに 家族の役に立つなら⸺　それが一番じゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si puedo ganar dinero y ayudar a mi familia, mejor que mejor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If I can make money and be useful to my family, there's nothing better.

CONTENT: で 打ち上げのメシは まだ届かねえの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Aún no llegó la comida para festejarlo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And so... has the food for the launch party arrived yet?

CONTENT: ありがとうございます ミオリネさん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you very much, Ms. Miorine.

CONTENT: 何が?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: For what?

CONTENT: みんなが納得できる方法⸺　考えてくれたんです... よね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pensaste en una opción que aceptaron todos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You worked out a plan acceptable to everyone, didn't you?

CONTENT: あいつらに抜けられたら困るだけよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Porque no me interesa que se vayan.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just couldn't afford to lose them.

CONTENT: 私 実はちょっと楽しいです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La verdad es que esto es divertido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: To tell the truth... this is kind of fun.

CONTENT: やりたいことリスト... 部活みたいで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La lista de cosas por hacer. Es como ser de un equipo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's like joining a club, just like my wish list.

CONTENT: バーカ 遊びじゃないって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esto no es un juego, tonta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Idiot. This isn't for amusement.

CONTENT: 止めて!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Stop here!
Huh?

CONTENT: ミオリネさん!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine?

CONTENT: は... 何よ これ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What the hell is this?!

CONTENT: 指示どおり規則を追加した
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As directed, I've added new regulations.

CONTENT: 学生起業規則53条第3項
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Reglamento escolar del emprendimiento, artículo 53, cláusula 3.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Article 53, paragraph 3 of the Student Business Startup Regulations...

CONTENT: 学生事業における新技術 安全性の証明
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: "Una nueva empresa debe demostrar que usa tecnología segura".
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: "Safety verification of new technology used in student businesses."

CONTENT: これでミオリネは 会社を立ち上げられない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Miorine no podrá establecer la suya.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Miorine can't start her company now.

CONTENT: ガンダムは グループの所有物に逆戻り
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El Gundam será del grupo de nuevo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The Gundam will revert to being group property.

CONTENT: あとはサリウス代表が破棄するだけ フフッ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El delegado Sarius solo tiene que tirarlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now Mr. Sarius just has to dispose of it.

CONTENT: ミオリネちゃん ちょっとかわいそう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I feel kind of sorry for Miss Miorine.

CONTENT: 大丈夫だって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't worry.

CONTENT: そんときは みんなで励ましてあげようよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We can all help cheer her up.

CONTENT: 破棄はさせないさ ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I won't let him dispose of it.

CONTENT: ガンダムはグループにも俺にも⸺　いずれ 必要になる存在だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tanto el grupo como yo necesitaremos a los Gundams.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The Gundam will eventually be needed by myself and the group.

CONTENT: ミオリネの会社は 俺が引き取らせてもらう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll be taking over Miorine's company.

CONTENT: もし 彼女が拒んだら?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And if she refuses?

CONTENT: 決まってるじゃん でしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's only one solution, right?

CONTENT: シャディクは 望んでいないだろうけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Though I doubt that's what Shaddiq wants.

CONTENT: 私たちは覚悟を決めている
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But we're prepared for what comes next.

CONTENT: ミオリネからガンダムを...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We'll simply seize the Gundam...

CONTENT: 奪い取る
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: from Miorine's hands.
